name: Astronomy Introduction
description: An introduction to the field of Astronomy, including the history of Astronomy, the study of light and radiation, the Solar System, and the Milky Way Galaxy.

name: Theoretical Astrophysics I
description: An introduction to the basic principles of theoretical astrophysics, including the theory of stellar structure, hydrodynamic equations, and stellar evolution.

name: Theoretical Astrophysics II
description: A continuation of Theoretical Astrophysics I, covering topics such as stellar populations, star formation, galactic structure and evolution, and cosmology.

name: Cosmology
description: A survey of the modern theories of cosmology, including topics such as the Big Bang, the evolution of the universe, and the structure of the universe.
